admission_text:
# Membership

## Become a Member

### [BASIC INDIVIDUAL $50 ANNUALLY](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119044020/https://square.link/u/TZgEjbgY)

*Benefits for individual member only

Basic membership offers the following privileges:

  * Discounts on lesson fees and workshops for members(s)
  * Discount tickets for Arts on Grand-produced performances
  * The first to know about Arts on Grand sponsored events and be the first to purchase discounted tickets
  * Invitation to Member-only events
  * Please fill out “What is this Payment for” with Name, Phone, Email, address and type of membership chosen

[ UPDATE MEMBERSHIP ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119044020/https://square.link/u/TZgEjbgY)

### [BASIC FAMILY $85 ANNUALLY](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119044020/https://square.link/u/fyBgLioe)

*Benefits for up to 2 adults and dependents

Basic membership offers the following privileges:

  * Discounts on lesson fees and workshops for members(s)
  * Discount tickets for Arts on Grand-produced performances
  * The first to know about Arts on Grand sponsored events and be the first to purchase discounted tickets
  * Invitation to Member-only events
  * Please fill out “What is this Payment for” with Name, Phone, Email, address, and type of membership chosen

[ UPDATE MEMBERSHIP ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119044020/https://square.link/u/fyBgLioe)

### [SUPPORTER $250](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119044020/https://square.link/u/xCPVXGh8)

Basic Member Privileges ...

#### [MEMBERSHIP ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119045048/https://www.artsongrand.org/membership/) #### [EXHIBITS ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119045048/https://www.artsongrand.org/exhibits/) #### [EVENTS ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119045048/https://www.artsongrand.org/events-calendar/) #### [DONATE ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119045048/https://www.artsongrand.org/donate/)

# Welcome to Arts On Grand

### Enriching life in northwest Iowa through the Arts

Formed in 1989, the Spencer Area Arts Council was created to encourage local artists, musicians and art lovers to showcase and present their work. In the early 2000’s the organization’s name was changed to Arts on Grand for their new location on Grand Ave. Arts on Grand is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

Today, Arts on Grand continues to promote and present local artists and musicians, with a mission of enriching the lives of N.W. Iowans through the arts. We offer a variety of classes throughout the year for both children and adults.

Our exhibit gallery hosts a variety of different artists and art, from color pencil to pastel artists. We also offer live music in our gallery from local musicians. A gift shop offers art, books and other items from local and Midwestern artists and authors.

## [ABOUT US ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119045048/https://www.artsongrand.org/about-us/)

## [CONTACT US ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119045048/https://www.artsongrand.org/contact-us/)
